game.name: Project Thea
game.categories: Single-player, Custom Volume Controls, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 잔혹한 세상에서 깨어나 당신의 식민지를 파괴하려는 위협에 맞서세요. 식민지를 재건하고, 황무지를 탐험하며, 희귀한 자원을 모아 생존을 도모하세요. 무자비한 바바 야가와 거래를 할 것인가, 아니면 사이버쥐를 해킹해 동료로 만들 것인가? 어둡고 전략적인 카드 기반 전술 전투가 펼쳐지는 생존 RPG입니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Wake to a brutal world bent on destroying your colony. Rebuild, Explore the Wastelands, and Gather scarce resources. Will you strike a deal with the ruthless Baba Yaga - or hack a rogue Cyber-Rat to turn it into an ally? A dark strategy-survival RPG with card-based tactical combat.

reviewHighlights.text: I didn't catch that this utilized LLM (aka AI) or I wouldn't have purchased it, but beyond that the game feels very much like a worse copy of earlier...
I loved Thea, and Thea 2, and so went into this with high hopes. But as the game currently stands (I realise it's still in early access) there just is...
